DOC.brief_summary: tempromandibuar disorders are a group of heterogenous pathologies affecting temporomandibular joint,muscles or both.in more than 90%of cases muscles are the origin of pain.TMDs cause pain,movement disability and deficit in quality of life.in more than 90%of cases pain is the major complaint.we run this investigation to find the analgesic effct of low level laser therapy versus pharmacotherapy with naproxen in improving pain.
DOC.brief_title: Low Level Laser Therapy Versus Pharmacotherapy in in Improving Masticatory Muscle Pain
DOC.criteria: patients with TMD affecting masticatory muscles systemic disease GI problem pregnancy epidermal cancer
